<root><template><title>Command

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[getDLCUsageTime]] appId </value></part><part><name>Syntax</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> appId: [[Number]] - DLC's Steam appId  </value></part><part><name>Parameter 1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Number]] - DLC assets usage time in seconds </value></part><part><name>Return Value</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _kartsUsage = [[getDLCUsageTime]] 288520;</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 1</name>=<value>
